title: Projects
subtitle: Some of the various study projects I work on in my free time
sorteador: Welcome to the Friend Picker project! This is an ongoing project as part of a course focusing on automated testing for React applications. The goal of this project is to create a simple application that allows users to randomly draw friends' names, making event organization and gift-giving more enjoyable.
repo: Welcome to the RepoRadar project! This project was developed with the purpose of retrieving information about GitHub developers through its official API.
